coherence.description: Phase coherence (0–1000, pad 4): 0 = random, 1000 = perfect alignment. Zero-padded.

width.description: Stereo width (0–1000, pad 4): 0 = mono, 1000 = max width. Zero-padded.

correlation.description: Phase correlation (0–1000, pad 4): 0 = fully out of phase, 1000 = fully in phase. Zero-padded.

description: PHA (prefix), coherence (4 digits), width (4 digits), correlation (4 digits); all zero-padded, no subvar prefixes. Example: PHA089507900865 = coherence 0895, width 0790, correlation 0865.
